Posts.Content: Thank you. I got all my results of metastatic in one go. Thought I just had back pain I sincerely hope there is hope for us all
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed. Please someone reassure me

Posts.Content: I have recently been diagnosed with metastatic breast cancer spread to the bones. I am really worried. I feel like I have a death sentence hanging over me. Please can someone reassure me that there is still hope
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed. Please someone reassure me

Posts.Content: Hi Rhonda I am on clonidine and I have found my flushes have improved immensely. Give them chance to work x
Posts.Title: clonidine
